message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.CC 

Reasoning: The paper discusses a network coding scheme for packet delivery in a broadcast network, which falls under the scope of information theory (cs.IT) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The use of causal feedback and resource allocation algorithms also suggests a focus on distributed computing (cs.DC) and systems and control (cs.SI). Finally, the paper may also touch on communication complexity (cs.CC) as it deals with the limitations of block coding models.
